name: Nicolò Navarin
content: Nicolò Navarin, Ph.D.Search this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationNicolò Navarin, Ph.D.I am an Associate Professor in Computer Science at the University of Padova, Italy.If you are a student and want to talk to me about a course, my office hours are on Friday afternoon. Please book a meeting here. I have been a research fellow at the University of Nottingham, under the supervision of prof. Thomas Gärtner,  and at the University of Padova, under the supervision of prof. Alessandro Sperduti. Previously, I have been  a visiting researcher at the University of Freiburg, Germany.I am a member of the Machine Learning Group @ UniPD.RESEARCH INTERESTS:Artificial Intelligence, more specifically:Machine Learning on structured dataKernel methodsArtificial Neural NetworksStatistical learning theoryOnline learningMachine learning for BioinformaticsBusiness process miningRemote sensingNEWS:4/8/2020 The new website of the Machine Learning Group @ UniPD  is up and running!8/5/2018          I won a NVidia GPU grant (Titian Xp)25/10/2017    I am one of the organizers of INNS Big Data and Deep Learning 201924/10/2017    Accepted SS @IJCNN18:  "Empowering Deep Learning Models" 20/09/2017    Accepted SS @ESANN18:  "Emerging trends in machine learning: beyond conventional methods and data" Member of:Google SitesReport abuseGoogle SitesReport abuse
